<style>
/* ===== AK-scoped styles so nothing escapes ===== */
.ak-wrap { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; }
/* Palette */
:root {
  --ak-blue: #0B3D91; --ak-blue-deep:#072b68; --ak-red:#CE1126; --ak-gold:#FFC20E; --ak-ink:#0B0C0C;
}

/* Hero */
.ak-hero{
  margin-top:1.2rem;border-radius:24px;overflow:hidden;
  box-shadow:0 26px 64px rgba(0,0,0,.28);
  background:
    radial-gradient(1100px 520px at 5% -20%, rgba(255,194,14,.28), transparent 60%),
    linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(11,61,145,.98), rgba(206,17,38,.94));
}
.ak-hero__grid{
  display:grid;grid-template-columns:140px 1fr;min-height:240px
}
.ak-hero__brand{
  background:linear-gradient(180deg,var(--ak-blue),var(--ak-blue-deep));
  display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding:12px
}
.ak-hero__brand img{width:96px;height:auto;display:block;filter:drop-shadow(0 10px 16px rgba(0,0,0,.25))}
.ak-hero__body{color:#fff;padding:28px 24px 32px}
.ak-hero__body h1{line-height:1.12;margin:0 0 .75rem 0}
.ak-hero__body p{opacity:.96;font-size:1.06rem;max-width:70ch;margin:0 0 1rem 0}

/* Buttons */
.ak-btn{display:inline-block;padding:.85rem 1.2rem;border-radius:999px;font-weight:800;text-decoration:none!important;
  transition:transform .15s ease, box-shadow .15s ease, filter .15s ease; margin-right:.7rem}
.ak-btn--gold{background:var(--ak-gold);color:var(--ak-ink);box-shadow:0 10px 22px rgba(255,194,14,.35)}
.ak-btn--ghost{border:2px solid #fff;color:#fff}
.ak-btn:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);filter:brightness(1.03)}

/* Section title */
.ak-title{position:relative;display:inline-block;margin-top:1.25rem}
.ak-title:after{content:"";position:absolute;left:0;bottom:-6px;width:140px;height:6px;
  background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--ak-gold),transparent);border-radius:4px}

/* Cards */
.ak-cards{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(270px,1fr));gap:1.2rem;margin-top:.8rem}
.ak-card{
  background:#fff;border-radius:18px;padding:1.25rem 1.3rem;border:2px solid rgba(11,61,145,.08);
  box-shadow:0 12px 26px rgba(0,0,0,.07);transition:transform .14s ease, box-shadow .14s ease, border-color .14s ease;
  position:relative;overflow:hidden
}
.ak-card:before{content:"";position:absolute;left:0;top:0;bottom:0;width:6px;
  background:linear-gradient(180deg,var(--ak-gold),rgba(255,194,14,0));border-top-left-radius:18px;border-bottom-left-radius:18px;opacity:.9}
.ak-card:hover{transform:translateY(-4px);border-color:var(--ak-gold);box-shadow:0 18px 40px rgba(11,61,145,.18)}
.ak-card h3{margin-top:.15rem}
.ak-card a{font-weight:700;text-decoration:none}
.ak-card a:hover{text-decoration:underline;text-underline-offset:3px}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width:860px){.ak-hero__grid{grid-template-columns:110px 1fr}.ak-hero__brand img{width:80px}}
@media (max-width:620px){.ak-hero__grid{grid-template-columns:1fr}.ak-hero__brand{justify-content:flex-start;padding:.9rem 1rem}
  .ak-hero__brand img{width:72px}.ak-hero__body{padding:1.1rem 1rem 1.4rem}}
</style>
